sentence: Because Democrats have made masking a test of one's good character, Abrams opened herself up to allegations of hypocrisy and unseriousness, allegations that were quickly and rightly supplied by Republican critics such as Governor Brian Kemp and former senator David Perdue.

sentence: Claimed the 2018 Georgia gubernatorial election was stolen' from Stacey Abrams Stacey Abrams acknowledged she didn't win but never officially conceded her Georgia gubernatorial defeat against her GOP rival Brian Kemp in 2018, drawing criticism from conservatives that she was questioning the integrity of her own election.
